name: reputedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is said to be true, although it is not known to be certain: She reputedly turned down a $2 million advertising contract. The leaves reputedly are good food for pigs. See
reputed
More examplesFewer examplesThe organization was reputedly responsible for the attacks.This is reputedly his favourite photo of himself.The drug reputedly destroys fat cells.
